title: Sam Bankman-Fried Testifies During Special Hearing—After The Jury Is Sent Home
description: The former CEO of the failed FTX exchange took the stand for an audience of one, so Judge Lewis Kaplan could vet the admissibility of his statements.

title: Crypto Analyst’s $XRP Price Prediction Suggests Crypto Could Hit $220 Target

title: $50,000,000,000 in Capital Could Flood Bitcoin in First Five Years After ETF Launch: Bitwise CEO Matt Hougan
description:
The CEO of the world’s largest crypto index fund manager Bitwise says that $50 billion could flow into a spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) within years of launching. In a new interview on the Unchained Podcast, Matt Hougan says that in the first year of a spot BTC ETF, about $5 billion could flow […]
